verses.verse: In the third <WH7969> year <WH8141> of the reign <WH4438> of king <WH4428> Belshazzar <WH1112> a vision <WH2377> appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> unto me, even unto me Daniel <WH1840>, after <WH310> that which appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> unto me at the first <WH8462>.

And I saw <WH7200> <WH8799> in a vision <WH2377>; and it came to pass, when I saw <WH7200> <WH8800>, that I was at Shushan <WH7800> in the palace <WH1002>, which is in the province <WH4082> of Elam <WH5867>; and I saw <WH7200> <WH8799> in a vision <WH2377>, and I was by the river <WH180> of Ulai <WH195>.

Then I lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, there stood <WH5975> <WH8802> before <WH6440> the river <WH180> a <WH259> ram <WH352> which had two shofars <WH7161>: and the two shofars <WH7161> were high <WH1364>; but one <WH259> was higher <WH1364> than the other <WH8145>, and the higher <WH1364> came up <WH5927> <WH8802> last <WH314>.

I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the ram <WH352> pushing <WH5055> <WH8764> westward <WH3220>, and northward <WH6828>, and southward <WH5045>; so that no beasts <WH2416> might stand <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him, neither was there any that could deliver <WH5337> <WH8688> out of his hand <WH3027>; but he did <WH6213> <WH8804> according to his will <WH7522>, and became great <WH1431> <WH8689>.

And as I was considering <WH995> <WH8688>, behold, an he <WH5795> goat <WH6842> came <WH935> <WH8802> from the west <WH4628> on the face <WH6440> of the whole earth <WH776>, and touched <WH5060> <WH8802> not the ground <WH776>: and the goat <WH6842> had a notable <WH2380> shofar <WH7161> between his eyes <WH5869>.

And he came <WH935> <WH8799> to the ram <WH352> that had <WH1167> two shofars <WH7161>, which I had seen <WH7200> <WH8804> standing <WH5975> <WH8802> before <WH6440> the river <WH180>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799> unto him in the fury <WH2534> of his power <WH3581>.

And I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> him come <WH5060> <WH8688> close unto <WH681> the ram <WH352>, and he was moved with choler <WH4843> <WH8698> against him, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the ram <WH352>, and brake <WH7665> <WH8762> his two <WH8147> shofars <WH7161>: and there was no power <WH3581> in the ram <WH352> to stand <WH5975> <WH8800> before <WH6440> him, but he cast him down <WH7993> <WH8686> to the ground <WH776>, and stamped <WH7429> <WH8799> upon him: and there was none that could deliver <WH5337> <WH8688> the ram <WH352> out of his hand <WH3027>.

Therefore the he <WH6842> goat <WH5795> waxed very <WH3966> great <WH1431> <WH8689>: and when he was strong <WH6105> <WH8800>, the great <WH1419> shofar <WH7161> was broken <WH7665> <WH8738>; and for it came up <WH5927> <WH8799> four <WH702> notable ones <WH2380> toward the four <WH702> winds <WH7307> of heaven <WH8064>.

And out of one <WH259> of them came forth <WH3318> <WH8804> a little <WH4704> shofar <WH7161>, which waxed exceeding <WH3499> great <WH1431> <WH8799>, toward the south <WH5045>, and toward the east <WH4217>, and toward the pleasant <WH6643> land.

And it waxed great <WH1431> <WH8799>, even to the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064>; and it cast down <WH5307> <WH8686> some of the host <WH6635> and of the stars <WH3556> to the ground <WH776>, and stamped <WH7429> <WH8799> upon them.

Yea, he magnified <WH1431> <WH8689> himself even to the prince <WH8269> of the host <WH6635>, and by him the daily <WH8548> sacrifice was taken away <WH7311> <WH8717> <WH8675> <WH7311> <WH8689>, and the place <WH4349> of his sanctuary <WH4720> was cast down <WH7993> <WH8717>.

And an host <WH6635> was given <WH5414> <WH8735> him against the daily <WH8548> sacrifice by reason of transgression <WH6588>, and it cast down <WH7993> <WH8686> the truth <WH571> to the ground <WH776>; and it practised <WH6213> <WH8804>, and prospered <WH6743> <WH8689>.

Then I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> one <WH259> saint <WH6918> speaking <WH1696> <WH8764>, and another <WH259> saint <WH6918> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto that certain <WH6422> saint which spake <WH1696> <WH8764>, How long shall be the vision <WH2377> concerning the daily <WH8548> sacrifice, and the transgression <WH6588> of desolation <WH8074> <WH8802>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> both the sanctuary <WH6944> and the host <WH6635> to be trodden under foot <WH4823> ?
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Unto two thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> days <WH6153> <WH1242>; then shall the sanctuary <WH6944> be cleansed <WH6663> <WH8738>.

And it came to pass, when I, even I Daniel <WH1840>, had seen <WH7200> <WH8800> the vision <WH2377>, and sought <WH1245> <WH8762> for the meaning <WH998>, then, behold, there stood <WH5975> <WH8802> before me as the appearance <WH4758> of a man <WH1397>.

And I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> a man's <WH120> voice <WH6963> between the banks of Ulai <WH195>, which called <WH7121> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Gavri'el <WH1403>, make this <WH1975> man to understand <WH995> <WH8685> the vision <WH4758>.

So he came <WH935> <WH8799> near <WH681> where I stood <WH5977>: and when he came <WH935> <WH8800>, I was afraid <WH1204> <WH8738>, and fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon my face <WH6440>: but he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Understand <WH995> <WH8685>, O son <WH1121> of man <WH120>: for at the time <WH6256> of the end <WH7093> shall be the vision <WH2377>.

Now as he was speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> with me, I was in a deep sleep <WH7290> <WH8738> on my face <WH6440> toward the ground <WH776>: but he touched <WH5060> <WH8799> me, and set <WH5975> <WH8686> me upright <WH5977>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I will make thee know <WH3045> <WH8688> what shall be in the last end <WH319> of the indignation <WH2195>: for at the time appointed <WH4150> the end <WH7093> shall be.
The ram <WH352> which thou sawest <WH7200> <WH8804> having <WH1167> two shofars <WH7161> are the kings <WH4428> of Media <WH4074> and Persia <WH6539>.
And the rough <WH8163> goat <WH6842> is the king <WH4428> of Grecia <WH3120>: and the great <WH1419> shofar <WH7161> that is between his eyes <WH5869> is the first <WH7223> king <WH4428>.

Now that being broken <WH7665> <WH8737>, whereas four <WH702> stood up <WH5975> <WH8799> for it, four <WH702> kingdoms <WH4438> shall stand up <WH5975> <WH8799> out of the nation <WH1471>, but not in his power <WH3581>.

And in the latter time <WH319> of their kingdom <WH4438>, when the transgressors <WH6586> <WH8802> are come to the full <WH8552> <WH8687>, a king <WH4428> of fierce <WH5794> countenance <WH6440>, and understanding <WH995> <WH8688> dark sentences <WH2420>, shall stand up <WH5975> <WH8799>.

And his power <WH3581> shall be mighty <WH6105> <WH8804>, but not by his own power <WH3581>: and he shall destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> wonderfully <WH6381> <WH8737>, and shall prosper <WH6743> <WH8689>, and practise <WH6213> <WH8804>, and shall destroy <WH7843> <WH8689> the mighty <WH6099> and the holy <WH6918> people <WH5971>.

And through his policy <WH7922> also he shall cause craft <WH4820> to prosper <WH6743> <WH8689> in his hand <WH3027>; and he shall magnify <WH1431> <WH8686> himself in his heart <WH3824>, and by peace <WH7962> shall destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> many <WH7227>: he shall also stand up <WH5975> <WH8799> against the Prince <WH8269> of princes <WH8269>; but he shall be broken <WH7665> <WH8735> without <WH657> hand <WH3027>.

And the vision <WH4758> of the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> which was told <WH559> <WH8738> is true <WH571>: wherefore shut thou up <WH5640> <WH8798> the vision <WH2377>; for it shall be for many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.

And I Daniel <WH1840> fainted <WH1961> <WH8738>, and was sick <WH2470> <WH8738> certain days <WH3117>; afterward I rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and did <WH6213> <WH8799> the king's <WH4428> business <WH4399>; and I was astonished <WH8074> <WH8709> at the vision <WH4758>, but none understood <WH995> <WH8688> it.
